data.subject: King Is Born
data.lyric:

 I told you before

 I told you before

 Like a beast

data.subject: Love Is The Answer
data.lyric:
Broken hearts everywhere
 From stepping on love we don't care
 Somebody tell me what we gonna do
 Ev

data.subject: Wake Me Up
data.lyric:
Feeling my way through the darkness
 
 Guided by a beating heart
 
 I cant tell where the journey wi
